column2: VaMatemadanda Vopomera VaMugabe Mhosva Yose yeGukurahundi
column3: Munyori wesangano revakamborwa hondo yerusununguko, VaVictor Matemadanda, vanoti hapana zvazvinobatsira kuti nyika irambe ichitsvaka munhu wekupomera mhosva yeGukurahundi izvo zviri pachena kuti vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ndivo vanofanirwa kubvunzwa uye kutsanangura mhosva yavakapara iyi. VaMatemadanda vanoti VaMugabe ndivo vanofanira kutaurira vanhu kuti zvipangamazano zvavo vaive vanaani panguva yeGukurahundi. Vanoti VaMugabe ndivo vaive mukuru wemauto, kana kuti "Commander-in-Chief", panguva iyi, uye semukuru wemauto, mutungamiri wenyika ndiye anotanga kana kumisa hondo. “Hapana minister kana commander wemauto ane simba rekutanga hondo. Hondo inotangwa napresident, yomiswa napresident,” VaMatemadanda vanodaro. Vanoti hurongwa hwemauto eFifth Brigade hwakatoshevedzerwa varairidzi vakabva kuNorth Korea, nekudaro hazvishandi kuramba vanhu vachinyenyeredza dambudziko rakatarisana nenyika. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika dzinoti mashoko aVaMatemadanda ekuda kuedza kuchenura mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa haana zvaanobatsira, sezvo VaMnangagwa vaive ivo gurukota rezvekugadzikana kwenyika vachiona nezvevasori panguva iyi. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti maoko aVaMnangagwa akangosvibawo sezvakaita aVaMugabe panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

column2: Hurumende Inomisa Chirongwa Chekupa Vadzidzi Zvitupa neNyaya yeCovid-19
column3: Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakamisa neMugovera chirongwa chekuti vana vanoda kunyora bvunzo dzeOrdinary neAdvanced Level vatore zvitupa nekuda kwekutyira kupararira kweCovid-19, nyanzvi munyaya dzedzidzo dzinoti zvakakosha kuti chirongwa ichi chienderere mberi kuitira kuti pasaita nhubu dzinonyorera vamwe mazamanishoni. Hurumende yainge yaisa parutivi zuro nanhasi semazuva maviri ekuti vaya vanoda kunyora bvunzo gore rino vatore zvitupa, asi yakazomisa chirongwa ichi chave pakati nezuro masikati yave kutyira kuti denda reCovid-19 ringapararire zvakanyanya mushure mekunge vanhu vabuda zvine mutsindo. Bazi rezvemukati menyika pamwe nevakafanobata chigaro chaRegistrar-General, VaHenry Machiri, vakazivisa nezuro kuti vakamisa chirongwa ichi mushure mekunge vanhu vakawandisa vaenda kumahofisi avo kunotorerwa zvitupa. Mapurisa akatozoshevedzwa kuzochengetedza runyararo uye vamwe vakanga vatorara pamahofisi aRegistrar General aya vachida zvitupa. Mumwe mudzidzi wepane chimwe chikoro muHarare, Chipo Zhou, uyo akamukira pamahofisi aRegistrar-General ari paMachipisa mumusha weHigfiled muHarare, audza Studio 7 kuti akawana paine vanhu vaidarirka chiuru vakanga vave mumutseste nechakare uye akazobva asina kutora chitupa mushure mekuudzwa kuti chirongwa ichi chaitirwa vaye vanodzidza muzvikoro zvakazvimirira kana kuti private colleges. Mumwe murairiridzi wepane chimwe chikoro mumusha weGlen View uyo aramba kudzomwa nezita, audza Studio 7 kuti ichokwadi kuti chirongwa ichi chinobata vana vanodzidza kuma private collegel. Ati vanhu vari muzvikoro zvehurumende, makunzuru kana zvemakereke havadi zvitupa kuti vanyore bvunzo. Murairidzi uyu atiwo vana vakawanda vaida zvitupa nekuti vanodzidza muzvikoro zvakazvimirira kana kuti zvisina kunyoreswa nehurumende uye zvisingabvumidzwe kunyoresa bvunzo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzedzidzo uye vari mutungamiriri wesangano rinomirira varairidzi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakakosha kuti vanoda kunyora bvunzo vasingadzidzi muzvikoro vatore zvitupa vachiti izvi zvinodzivirira hutsotsi nechikiribidi pabvunzo. Doctor Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinosuwisa kuti vanhu vanotambura kutora zvitupa munyika vachiti hapafaniri kuitwa zvematongerwo enyika pakutora zvitupa. Mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, vanoti ichokwadi kuti vaya vasiri muzvikoro zvakanyoreswa kana kuti vari kudzidza kuma Non-Formal school, kana kuti vanganzi External Candidates, ndivo chete vanosungirwa kunge vaine zvitupa pabvunzo, kwete vanodzidza musvikoro zviri pasi pehurumende, makanzuru kana mamishoni. Zimbabwe Schools Examinations Council yakazivisa mwedzi wapera kuti vanoda kunyora bvunzo vanofanira kunge vabhadhara mari dzebvunzo musi wa9 Chikunguru uye vano nonoka vanofanira kubhadhara mari iyi musi wa30 Chikungururu. Doctor Zhou vaudza Studio 7 kuti vasina kukwanisa kutora zvitupa nezuro vachinenguva yekutora zvitupa izvi sezvo pachine nguva pazonosvika 30 Chikunguru. Vatiwo Covid-19 inogona kukanganisa kunyorwa kwebvunzo idzi uye semaonero avo, gore rino vana vachafoira zvakanyanya sezvo vasina nguva yekudzidza yakakwana uye varairidzi vasiri kudzidzisa nekuti havasi kufara nemihoro yavanotambira. Hurumende yakambomisa kuvhurwa kwezvikoro nekuti Covid-19 iri kupararira zvakanyanya. No media source currently available

column2: ZEC Yotarisira Kupeta Gwaro Idzva reVavhoti Mukupera kweGore
column3: Sachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission kana kuti ZEC Amai Rita Makarau vanoti vanotarisira kuti panopera gore rino vanenge vave negwaro idzva revavhoti. Izvi zviri kuitwa sezvo nyika iri kutarisira kuita sarudzo gore rinouya. Vanotiwo mukupera kwemwedzi uno vanenge vave nemichina yose inodiwa mukunyoresa vavhoti. Nemusi weChishanu, ZEC inoti yakakwanisa kupihwa michina mazana mana pamichina zviuru zvitatu zvakatengwa nehurumende kubva kukambani yeLaxton Group yekuChina. Amai Makarau vanotiwo vanhu vanokwanisa kuvhota nezvetupa zverata musarudzo dzegore rinouya. Mashoko aya anotevera zvainge zvambotaurwa namabharani mukuru wehurumende vaTobaiwa Mudede avo vainge vati vanhu havakwanise kuvhota kana vasina zvitupa zvebepa. Amai Makarau vanoti kana vachinge vapedza kugadzira gwaro revavhoti vanofunga kuti sarudzo dzinenge dzokwanisa kuitwa. No media source currently available

column2: Zvikwata 4 zvorwira mukombe
column3: HAKUDANWE anonzwa nemusi weMugovera uye neSvondo apo zvikwata zvina zvasara mumutambo weDivision One Axis Solutions Super 8 zvinoti Simba Bhora FC, Herentals Under-20, Golden Eagles neTrojan Stars zvichatatsurana musemi-final.   Musi weMugovera , kuchatambwa semi-final yekutanga iyo ichaona Herentals U-20 ichibandana neSimba Bhora FC kunhandare yeMorris Depot muHarare kuchiti musi weSvondo Golden Eagles (Gondo Harishaye) ichatamba neTrojan Stars kuEllis Robins muHarare zvekare.   Murairidzi weSimba Bhora FC, Arthur Tutani, anoti chikwata chake chiri kutokunya zvakasimba sezvo vari kuda kuhwina mumutambo uyu.   Achitaura pamusoro pekukundwa kwavakaitwa neChegutu Pirates, Tutani anoti mikombe yakaita seAxis Solutions Super 8 mikuru uye vari kuukoshesa sezvo vachida kupedza mwaka uno vaine mikombe yakawanda.   “Sechikwata, tiri kufara nematambiro atiri kuita mwaka uno. Mitambo yakaita seweAxis Solutions Super 8 Cup uyu unotibatsira kuti tipe vamwe vatambi mikana sezvo rwendo ruchiri rurefu kusvika tapedza mwaka wegore rino.   “Takanangana nemutambo weAxis Solutions Super 8 Cup, tiri kuda kuuhwina. Asi, tichange tichitora mutambo sekuuya kwaunenge uchiita dzamara tasvika kufainari. Hakuna asingade kuhwina mukombe uye isu tiri kuudawo mukombe uyu,” anodaro Tutani.   Kuchiti murairidzi weGondo Harishaye, Gilbert Mushangazhike – uyo chikwata chake chakaumburudza Ngezi U19 svondo radarika kunhandare yeBaobab uko chakahwina 2-1 – anoti vari kudawo mukombe uyu zvakanyanya.    Gilbert Mushangazhike   Gondo Harishaye ichasangana neTrojan Stars iyo yakakunda Commando Bullets 2-1 svondo radarika mumutambo wakatambirwa kuTrojan, kuBindura.   Mushangazhike anoti ari kutarisira zvikuru kufambira mberi kwe[1]chikwata chake mumutambo uyu.   “Mwaka wakareba uye kune vamwe vatambi vasiri kuwana mukana wekutamba saka ndivo vatiri kupawo mukana mumutambo uyu apo tiri kuzama kubata zvinangwa zvedu zvose zvemwaka uno.   “Tave kutarira mitambo yedu iri mberi uye ticharwa semvumba kuti tihwine mutambo wedu wesemi-final kusvika kufainari.   “Kutamba mitambo yemikombe zvinopa mukana wekunyora nhoroondo. Nenyasha dzaMwari, ticharwa kuti tihwine mukombe uyu,” anodaro Mushangazhike.   Murairidzi weTrojan Stars, Clifford Sakala, anoti mutambo wechikwata chake neGolden Eagles uchange wakaoma sezvo Gondo Harishaye ichitamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura.   “Tiri kutarisira zvikuru kusangana neGolden Eagles mumutambo wedu wesemi-final uyo tinoziva kuti unenge usiri nyore. Asi chatinoziva ndechekuti ticharwa kuti tifambire mberi. Tiri kugadzirira zvakasimba mutambo wedu watakatarisana nawo,” anodaro Sakala.

column2: Shaya ari muchipatara
column3: naMilcah Nhakura SHASHA yakambonetsa ichitamba nhabvu, George ‘Mastermind’ Shaya, anoti anogamuchira zvakaitika kwaari zvekudamburwa gumbo rake rekurudyi zvichitevera kunetseka kwaakange aita nechirwere chepasi petsoka chinozivikanwa nekuti ganrene.   Achitaura neKwayedza svondo rino ari muchipatara cheParirenyatwa Group of Hospitals, muHarare, Shaya anoti anoisa zvose mumawoko aMwari.   “Muhupenyu hwedu chinenge chaitika tinofanirwa kuzvitambira. Mwari variko uye hatizvirambe.   “Munhu unofanirwa kugara wakagadzirira zvese zvese muhupenyu zvinogona kuitika,” anodaro.   Paakashanyirwa neKwayedza, Shaya aive ane mudzimai wake – Agnes Shaya – uyo anoti murume wake akange atambudzwa zvikuru nechirwere chaive pagumbo rake apo raingopera nekudyika kubva nekutsoka.   “Baba vange varwadziwa hama, gumbo rakavashungurudza iri saka tiri kutozviona kuti zvakange zviri nani kuti vari bviswe pane kurwadziwa kwavakange vachiita vainaro gumbo racho.   “Iye zvino tinoona kuti vasununguka manje, havacharwadziwe vave kunzwa zvakanaka pane zvavakange vari kunzwa. Isu semhuri tave kungotambira zvakaitika.   “Asi hatidi kunyepa zvakatirwadza nekuti gumbo racho ndiro ravaitamba naro nhabvu, vachiita zvidavado zvavo,” anodaro Agnes.   Anoti murume wake haasi kuzomusiya ari ega uye achamira naye achimubatsira pane zvese zvaanenge achida.   “Mumwe wangu uyu ini ndini ndinomubikira uye kumuwachira, ndicharamba ndakamira naye ndichiona kuti akagara zvakanaka here nekuti panguva ino tinofanirwa kuramba takamira tese.   “Zvakaitika izvi tinongozviisa mumawoko aMwari. Asi vachibuda muno vanofanirwa kuenda kuRehab centre kuti vambonogara vachitariswa nekuti vakangonanga kumba vanogona kunozvikuvadza rimwe gumbo racho,” anodaro Agnes.   Shaya mumwe wevatambi venhabvu vakaita mukurumbira uye munhorondo yemutambo uyu ndiye ega akakwanisa kuhwina mubairo weSoccer Star of the Year kashanu.   Zvakadai, imwe shasha yakambonetsa ichitamba nhabvu kuzvikwata zvinoti Dynamos FC nemaWarriors, David ‘Yogi’ Mandigora – uyo akadamburwawo gumbo rake muna 2017 nekuda kwedenda regomarara – anoti munhu anofanirwa kugamuchira zvose zvinoitika muhupenyu hwake.   “Muhupenyu munhu anofanirwa kugara akagadzirira zvese nekuti hatizive kuti mangwana unomuka uripi. Zvese zvese zvinogona kuitika uye usingafungire.   “Kana zvaitika sezvandakasangana nazvo zvekugurwa gumbo izvi wotongozvitambira nekuti ndizvo zvinenge zvavepo panguva yacho,” anodaro Yogi.   Anoti achazoshanyira Shaya kumba kwake kana achinge abuda muchipatara.   PIX: George Shaya   Caption: George Shaya aine mudzimai wake Agnes Shaya kuchipatara cheParirenyatwa Group of Hospitals nemusi weChipiri svondo rino.

column2: Vashandi Vazhinji Vanoti Havatarisire Kupiwa Mabhonasi Gore Rino
column3: Sangano rinomirira vashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti haritarisiri kuti vashandirwi vachanyima vashandi vavo mari dzekuvatenda dzemabhonasi gore rino sezvo zviri muzvibvumirano zvemabasa zvakanyoreranwa pasi pakati pemapoka maviri aya kuti vashandi vanobhadharwa mabhonasi. Mamwe makambani anotanga kubhadhara vashandi mari dzemabhonasi mwedzi uno waGumiguru, asi gore rino zvakanyarara nekuda kwemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi munyika. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti makambani mashoma kwazvo anobhadhara mabhonasi nekuti zvinobva pakuti gore iroro awana marii yakawanda zvakadii. Mukuru wesangano revashandirwi, reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, EMCOZ, VaJohn Mufukare, vaudza Studio 7 kuti panyaya dzemabhonasi, sangano ravo rinowanzo kuzvisiira kuboka rimwe nerimwe kuti rinokwanisa zvakadii kubhadra vashandi varo mabhonasi avo. No media source currently available

column2: ‘Zvimbokoma zvaJoshua naWilder zvombomiswa’
column3: anofanirwa kumira kwegore rese asati arwa naDeontay Wilder mumutambo weWorld Heavyweight Title Unification, sekutaura kwaBarry Hearn.   Asi, Hearn – uyo ane makore akawanda ari munyaya dzekuronga mitambo anoti achange asipo pachaitwa hurukuro dzekuronga nezvemutambo uyu pachasangana shasha iyi iyo ine mabhande eWBO, IBF neWBA naJoshua svondo rinotevera apo vacharonga remangwnaa rake mumutambo uyu.   Sachigaro weMatchroom – Hearn – akagadza mwana wake, Eddie, kuti agotungamira Joshua mumutambo uyu nenyaya dzake dzese asi anenge achiraira hake pano neapo zvese zvinenge zvichidiwa kuti basa riende kumberi.   Wilder, uyo ane bhande reWBC, mwedzi wadarika akanyorera Joshua padandemutande achitaura kuti vamiriri vake vane mari inosvika 35.9 miriyoni paunzi yekuronga kuti mutambo uyu uitwe pakati pavo gore rino.   Eddie akatsanangura kuti vane zvakawanda zvavanoda kuti vatange vavimbiswa vasati vasaina kuti mutambo uyu uenderere mberi.   Asi baba vake vakataura kuti nhandare yeManchester United yeOld Trafford ndiyo inogona kurongerwa kuitwa mutambo uyu vachiti, “Zvinogoneka”.   “Ndine musangano naAnthony Joshua svondo rinotevera naEddie, Eddie asati aenda kuNew York kunoronga mutambo uyu.” – SportsMail Boxing

column2: Victoria Falls Inokwanisa Kubaya Nhomba Vanhu Vakawanda Zvekukwanisa kuDzivirira Kupararira kweCovid-19
column3: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neSvondo kuti munhu mumwechete akafa neCovid-19 uye vamwe vanhu makumi maviri nevaviri kana kuti 22, vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Izvi zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nyika yose pachiuru chimwe nemazana mashanu ane makumi mashanu nevanomwe, kana kuti 1 557. Ukuwo, vanhu vasere, vazhinji vavo vari vana vechikoro, vanonzi vakaiswa kwavo voga (quarantine) kuBulawayo mushure mekuwanikwa kwedenda reCovid-19 pachikoro cheMzilikazi Primary School. Mukuru wezvehutano mudunhu reBulawayo, Dr. Edwin Sibanda, vaudza bepanhau reChronicle kuti vasere ava vakaendeswa kuchipatara cheThorngrove neku Elangeni Training Centre mushure mekuona kuti vamwe vevanhu ava vanogara mudzimba diki izvo zvinovatadzisa kuzogara kwavo voga. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvakachatanga hwakasvika pazviuru makumi matatu nezvisere zvine makumi masere nevatanhatu, kana kuti 38 086. Ukuwo, bazi rezvehutano rakazivisawo kuti vanhu zviuru gumi nezviviri nezana negumi nevaviri, kana kuti 12 112, vakabaiwa nhomba yekutanga neSvondo izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabaiwa nhomba iyi pazviuru mazana matatu nemakumi matatu nezvitanhatu zvine mazana matanhatu, kana kuti 336 600. Vamwe zviuru zvishanu nemazana masere nevanomwe, kana kuti 5 807, vakabaiwa nhomba yepiri zvakasvitsawo huwandu hwevabaiwa nhomba iyi pazviuru makumi mashanu nezvitatu zvine mazana mana negumi nevasere, kana kuti 53 418. Izvi zviri kuuya panguva iyo dhorobha reVictoria Falls rakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vakwanisa kubaiwa nhomba dzose pazvikamu makumi manomwe nezvinomwe kubva muzana, kana kuti 77 percent. Izvi zvinopa kuti Victoria Falls, iyo inonzi ine vanhu vanokodzera kubaiwa nhomba vanosvika zviuru makumi maviri nezvishanu, kana kuti 25 000, rive dunhu rekutanga munyika kudzivirirwa kubva mukupararira kwedenda iri, kana kuti herd immunity. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avo vakabaiwa nhomba yavo yekutaga vari kuVictoria Falls, varumbidza zvikuru danho rakatorwa nedhoorobha iri rekubaya vanhu vakawanda kudaro nhomba. Studio 7 yabata mukuru anoona nezvekudzivirirwa kweCovid-19, Dr. Agnes Mahomva kuti tinzwe zvizhinji, asi vati vanga vari mumusangano. Asi mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti zvinofadza chose kuti Victoria Falls yakwanisa kuwana vanhu vakawanda kudaro vabaiwa nhomba, asi vanoti dhorobha iri rakakwanisa kuita izvi sezvo rakangotanga nekubaya munhu wese. VaRusike vanoti mamwe madhorobha nemaguta vakatanga kubaya nhomba iyi muzvikamu zvikamu, izvo zvakaita kuti vanhu vaibaiwa vave vashoma. Asi vanoti kubayiwa nhomba kwevanhu vanosvika zvikamu makumi manomwe nezvinomwe kubva muzana uku kunogona kushaya basa kana vashanyi pamwe nevanhu vanobva munzvimbo dzakapoteredza dhorobha iri vasina kubaiwawo sezvo vachikwanisa kusiya zvakare hutachiwana hweCovid-19 pavanopinda nekubuda mudhorobha iri. Dhorobha reVictoria Falls rinonzi rakawaniswa nhomba inoita makumi matanhatu ezviuru, zvichireva kuti vagari vanosvika makumi matatu ezviuru vanokwanisa kubaiwa nhmbo dzose dziri mbiri. No media source currently available

column2: Chirwere cheCovid-19 Chopararira Zvikuru kuMaruwa
column3: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vakambove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vanoti vana vechikoro vari kudzoka kumusha mushure mekuvharwa kwezvikoro ndivo vamwe vari kubatsira kuparardzira chirwere ichi kumaruwa sezvo chirwere ichi chave kunetsa muzvikoro. Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vakaudza Studio 7 pakupera kwesvondo kuti bazi ravo riri kurwadziwa zvakanyanya nekufa kuri kuramba kuchiita vanhu munyika zvichikonzerwa neCovid-19. Dr Madzorera vanoti hurumende iri kuedza kudzikisa huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi asi vachiti vanhu kumaruwa vanofanirwa kupihwa ruzivo rwakawanda pamusoro pechirwere ichi sezvo vaimbofunga kuti ichi chirwere chevanhu vemumadhorobha chete. No media source currently available

column2: Bhajeti reKanzuru yeMasvingo Rinoramba Kutambirwa neVagari Vakawanda
column3:
Vagari vemuguta reMasvingo vari kuramba kutambira bhajeti rekanzuru yavo regore rinouya remadhora mabhiriyoni mana vachiti rakakurisa zvikuru uye vagari vazhinji vachatadza kubhadhara mitero nekuda kwekuoma kwakaita hupenyu munyika.

Vachitaura neStudio 7 mushure mekuitwa misangano yekunzwa dzevanhu pabhajeti iri, vagari ava vanoti ivo zvikamu mazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvishanu kubva muzana zviri kuda kukwidzwa mitero zvakakurisa sezvo vanhu vakawanda vachatadza kubhadhara mitero iyi. Mumwe mugari, Amai Beatrice Hamdziripi, vemumusha we Runyararo West, vanoti ivo kukwidzwa kwemitero uku kunomesera vagari vazhinji avo vasiri kuwedzerwa mari kwavanoshanda nekudaro vanozonetseka kubhadara mari idzi kana dzikakwidzwa nekanzuru.

Mumwe mugari, VaHardlife Tangayi wekuHillside, vanoti zvakaoma kuti kanzuru iwedzere mitero nezvikamu zvakadaro panguva iyo ruzhinji rwevagari rwuri kuvharirwa mvura nekutadza kubhadhara mari iri kudiwa izvozvi, nekudaro gore rinouya dhorobha rose rinogona kuzotadza kubhadhara mvura kana mitero iyi ikakwidzwa.

Gore rino vagari vazhinji vari kubhadhara mari yemvura iri pakati pezviuru
zvitatu nezviuru zvitanhatu zvemadhora pamwedzi. Mari iyi ikakwidzwa gore rinouya, vagari vanenge vobhara mari inotangira pazviuru zvisere nemazana masere ane makumi mashanu emadhora kusvika pazviuru gumi nezvinomwe nemazana manomwe emadhora emaRTGS. Meya weguta reMasvingo, VaCollen Maboke, vanoti kanzuru yakatarisa
zvinhu zvakawanda isati yakwidza mitero iyi, zvinosanganisira kukwira
kwemafuta emotokari dzebasa nemitengo yemishonga yekuchenesa mvura iyo inotengwa kunze kwenyika nemari yekunze.

Asi sangano rinomirira vagari reMasvingo United Residents and Rate
Payers Alliance (MURRA) rinoti kunyange zvinhu zvakakwidzwa mitengo semafuta edzimotokari chikamu chekanzuru chakangokurisa uye vagari vazhinji kwavanowana mari haina kukwidzwa nezvikamu zvakadaro. Anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muMURRA, Muzvare Rumbidzai
Magurupira, vanoti kanzuru iri kuda kusiya mugari ari parumananzombe.

Vamwe vagari vanoti zve chinonyanya kuvarwadza ndechekuti
vanokwidzirwa mari asi mvura yacho ichinetsa kuuya mudzimba dzavo. Mvura inouya kwemaawa mashoma shoma makuseni oga oga yobva yaenda voswera vasina mvura izvo zvinozoita kuti vashandise zvibhorani zviri mumawadhi asi panouya mapepa emvura, mitengo inenge yakakwira zvikuru. No media source currently available

column2: Vana Chiremba Vanoti Zimbabwe Inokwanisa Kubatsira Vana Vane Otizimu
column3: Sedzimwe nyika zhinji, Zimbabwe iri kutarisana nechirwere cheotizimu icho chinonyanya kubata vana, zvikuru vanakomana. Bazi rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwezvirwere, reCenters For Disease Control, rinoti munhu mumwe chete pavanhu makumi masere nevasere munyika dzese ane otizimu. Vabereki vazhinji vanotadza kuwana zvikwanisiro kuvana vavo vane chirwere ichi izvo zvinozoita kuti vana ava vasainda kuchikoro. Mutauriri wesangano reZimbabwe Association of Doctors For Human Rights, Dr Fortune Nyamande, vanoti Zimbabwe ine vana chiremba vazhinji uye vanhu vakadzidziswa kubatsira vana vane otizimu kunyange hazvo paine zvimwe zvapingaidzo zvavanosangana nazvo munyika. No media source currently available

column2: Zvizvarwa Zviri Kunze Zvowana Mukana weKupinda Muchirongwa Chinorerutsa Zvinhu Munguva yeKushaikirwa
column3: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika mukupera kwesvondo zvakave nemukana wekunzwisisa pamusoro pechirongwa chekuvigana kana munhu achinge ashaya, cheSahwira International Plan chiri pasi peNyaradzo Life Assuarance Company. Mukana uyu wakavepo kuburikidza nemusangano wakaitwa padandemutande reZoom nevari kumirira kambani iyi kunze kwenyika, vekambani yeMKI, iri pasi pezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica. Mumwe mukuru wekambani yeMKI, VaEsau Mavindidze, vanoti vanhu vanodarika zana vakakwanisa kupinda mumusangano wavo uyu vachibvunzawo mibvunzo yakakosha zvikuru pamusoro pechirongwa ichi, icho chakanangana nekurerutsira vari kunze munguva yekushaikirwa. VaMavindize vanoti chirongwa cheSahwira International Plan ichi chinorerutsa ndima zvikuru kana mufi achida kuendeswa kunoradzikwa kumusha. Vanoti munguva zhinji hama neshamwari dzemufi vanozopinda mudambudziko rekuunganidza mari kuti vakwanise kuzadzisa zvido zvemufi zvekunoradzikwa kwaakasarudza achiri mupenyu. VaMavindize vanoti musangano wavo wavakaita uyu wakaratidza kuti vanhu vave kutarisira kuchirongwa ichi, uye vave kusununguka kutaura nezveremangwana ravo kana vachinge vazosiya pasi rino, izvo zvagara zvichionekwa nevamwe sechinhu chisingataurike nezvacho nguva zhinji. No media source currently available

column2: VaChiyangwa Vokurudzira VaTsigiri veNhabvu Kuti Vanotambira maWarriors kuNhandare yeNdege
column3: Mutungamiri weZIFA VaPhilip Chiyangwa vari kukurudzira vanhu vose munyika kuti vaende kunhandare yendege yeHarare International Airport neChipiri masikati kunotambira chikwata cheZimbabwe Warriors icho chakashura mare nekudambura Zambia 3-1 kuSouth Africa nemusi weSvondo chichibva chasimudza mukombe weCOSAFA Castle Cup. Vachitaura neStudio 7, VaChiyangwa vati uyu mukombe wavo wekutanga vachitungamira sangano renhabvu reZIFA nekudaro vane mufaro mukuru. Vavimbisawo kuti vachaona kuti voitirei vakomana vemaWarriors ava. VaChiyangwa vakasarudzwa kuti vatungamire ZIFA muna 2015 mushure mekukunda musarudzo VaTrevor Carelse Juul, VaLeslie Gwindi naVaJames Takavada.

column2: Vanhu Vomanikidzwa Kutenga Hupfu neZvitupa
column3: Vamwe vagari vemuChinhoyi vanoti havasi kufara nedanho rakatorwa nevamwe vanotengesa hupfu rekuti munhu aburitse chitupa chake kuti atenge hupfu. Zvitoro zvakaita seN. Richards, Gain Wholesale neOK Zimbabwe zvave kutengesera hupfu kune munhu anenge ayine chitupa chete. Danho iri riri kushorwa nevakawanda avo vari kuti zvinosiya vanhu vakawanda vasina zvitupa vachifa nenzara. Mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi VaBasildon Kanonge vanoti zvekudya ikodzero yemunhu nekudaro haafanirwe kutadza kudya nekuti haana chitupa. Izvi zvatsigirwa naVaIsrael Nyandoro avo vanoti vanhu vakawanda havasikupihwa zvitupa kwamudzviti zvichinzi havana mapepa anogadzira zvitupa. Asi vamwe vakaita saAmai Cornilia Matekenya vanoti kutenga hupfu munhu aburitsa chitupa zviri kuita kuti hupfu hutengwe nevanhu vakawanda uye zvinoderedza huori. VaDesire Mapfumo vanoti zvose zviri kuitika zvinoreva kuti chikafu chishoma munyika nekudaro hurumende inofanirwa kuunza hupfu hwakawanda kuvanhu. Mukuru wechitoro cheN. Richards VaJohn Matikiti vanoti vari kuti munhu anoda hupfu anofanirwa kuuya nechitupa kuti vazvichenure kana vazobvunzwa kuti vakatengesera ani hupfu. Hupfu hweRoller Meal uhwo hwavekutengwa nemadhora makumi manomwe emabhondi kana RTGS sezvo vanohugaya vachipihwa mari nehurumende huri kunetsa munyika yose. Hurumende iri kufungawo kupa vanhu vanoshaiwa makuponi ekutenga hupfu senzira yekupedza huori munyaya dzezve kugaya nekutengeswa kwehupfu. Vamwe vanhu vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutanga hupfu muzvitoro nemari iri pasi vonoutengesa nemutengo wepamusoro pamukoto. World Food Programme inoti vanhu vanoda kusvika mamiriyoni masere vakatarisana nenzara inotyisa munyika uye vanoda kupihwa chikafu nechimbi chimbi. Izvi zvinonzi nesangano iri zvakakonzerwa nekusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura uye mitemo yehurumende iri kungovandudzwa chero nguva. No media source currently available

column2: Voronga kusimudzira netball
column3: SHASHA yakambonetsa mumutambo wenetball, Perpetual Siyachitema, anoti iye nevamwe vakambotamba mumutambo uyu vane hurongwa hwekuusimudzira nechinangwa chekubika vatambi vechikwata chenyika chemaGems chemangwana.   Siyachitema vazhinji vanomuziva nechiremerera chaakapihwa icho chichagara munhoroondo yemutambo wenetball munyika muno izvo zvakamuona achitungamira vatambi vemaGems kumakwikwi eVitality World Cup akaitirwa kuLiverpool, kuEngland, munaChikunguru gore rapera.   Achibva kumakwikwi aya, Siyachitema akasvika ndokusendeka kutamba netball ndokutanga kurairidza mutambo uyu.   Parizvino ari kurairidza chikwata cheGlow Queens icho chinokwikwidza muNetball Super League.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Siyachitema anoti ari kumhanya-mhanya zvikuru kuronga nevamwe vakambotamba mutambo uyu vekumapurovhinzi akasiyana kuti vasimudzire netball.   “Masvondo adarika, takasangana sevatambi vakambotamba netball kare tikambobandana mumutambo uyu. Tapedza, takagara pasi ndokukurukura kuti todii kuti tibatsirane pakusimudzira mutambo uyu. Ini ndave kurairidza mutambo uyu saka ndinoda chaizvo kuti vandakatamba navo kare vandibatsire muhurongwa hwangu uhu kuti ndifambe naho,” anodaro.   Siyachitema anoti shuviro yake kuti vese vakambotamba mutambo uyu vawanikwe vachiita mabasa akasiyana anosanganisira kurairidza kana kupinda muzvigaro zvekutungamira netball.   “Sevatambi vakambotamba mutambo uyu, zvakakosha chaizvo kuti tiwanikwe tichitora mabasa akasiyana uye tichironga kuti mutambo uyu wofamba sei. Isu takambotamba uye tinoziva zvinenge zvichiitika saka tinofanirwa kupinda mumutambo uyu toitawo mabasa ekuusimudzira.   “Saka tiri kutenderera mapurovhinzi akasiyana tichitamba nekukurukura neshasha dzakambotamba netball tichironga kuti toita sei kuti netball iende kumberi,” anodaro Siyachitema.

column2: VaMnangagwa Vanorumbidza Major General Mugoba Vachivaviga kuHeroes Acre
column3: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaviga gamba renyika, Major General Trust Mugoba, vachiti kushaya kwavo, pamwe nekushaya kwevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, kwasiya nyika yarasikirwa zvikuru. Vachitaura pakuradzikwa kwaVaMugoba, VaMnangagwa vati nyika yakarasikirwa zvikuru svondo rapfuura apo pakashaya VaMugabe naVaMugoba musi mumwe chete. Vati ndufu dzemagamba maviri aya dzinoita kuti veruzhinji varangarire hondo yerusununguko. Vati VaMugoba munhu akakura muchiuto kubvira panguva yehondo uyewo zvichitevera rusununguko muna 1980, vakati izvi ndizvo zvaita kuti varadzikwe paHeroes Acre. VaMnangagwa vati VaMugoba, avo vashaya vaine chigaro chepamusoro muchiuto kuAfrican Union kuEthopia, munhu aiziva kukosha kwerunyararo muAfrica uye zvakakosha kuti runyararo urwu ruchengetedzwe. Vatendawo mauto nekuchentegedza runyararo munyika vachiti hurumende yavo haisi kuzorega vanhu vachiita zvavanoda kukanganisa runyararo nerusununguko hwakaunzwa nevanhu vakaita semushakabvu. VaMnangagwa vati mutemo uchashandisa pane avo vanoda kukanganisa ruranyararo munyika. Vati vanoziva kutambura kuri munyika nekuda kwezvirango zvakatemerwa nyika pamwe nezvirongwa zvekuvandudza uye vari kutora matanho ekugadzirisa izvi. Mutevedzeri wemukuru wedare reSeneti, Retired Major General Mike Nyambuya, avo vakashanda nemushakabvu vati VaMugoba munhu aiziva nekuita basa rake nemazvo. VaMugoba vakashaya vave nechinzvimbo chepamusoro mumauto eAfrica National Union kuEthopia. Vange vave nemakore makumi matanhatu ekuberekwa. No media source currently available

column2: Huori Muhurumende Hoendesa Nyika kuMawere
column3: Nyaya yehuori yanetsa munyika zvikuru mumakambani ehurumende ayo ari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita chikiribidi munyaya yematenda ane mari inosvika mabhiriyoni emadhora. Nyaya yehuori yanetsa munyika zvikuru mumakambani ehurumende ayo ari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita chikiribidi munyaya yematenda ane mari inosvika mabhiriyoni emadhora. Huori hunonzi nevakawanda huri kupawo kuti nyika irambe iri mumadhaka. Mapazi ehurumende akaita seremhando dzemoto anonzi akapa basa kunhengo yeZanu-PF, VaPsychology Mazivisa, rekushambadzira kambani iyi kunyangwe paine vanhu vari kuita basa iri. Kambani yeZesa inonziwo iri kupa VaWicknel Chivhayo mamiriyoni emadhora ekuita zvinonzi nevamwe zviri kuitwa nechikiribidi. Vakuru kumakambani akaita seZimra neAnti-Corruption Commission vari kuferefetwa pari zvino nenyaya dzehuori. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakatendawo kuti mari inosvika mabhiriyoni gumi nemashanu yemangoda yakatsakatira kwachiyadzwa. Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Coalition on Debt and Development VaJoy Mabenge, vanoti mutungamiri wenyika anofanira kuona kuti nyaya yehuori yapararira. No media source currently available

column2: Bato reCCC Rinokurudzira Veruzhinji Kupfeka Nhumbi dzeYellow seMucherechedzo weKutsigira Nhengo Gumi neNhatu dziri muHusungwa
column3: Bato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change rakurudzira neChishanu vana veZimbabwe kuti vapfeke nhumbi dzeruvara rwe yellow, senzira yekutsigira nhengo dzaro gumi nenhatu dziri muhusungwa mushure mekusungwa dzichipomerwa mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga. Nhengo idzi dzinonzi dzakakonzera mhirizhonga kuNyatsime kuChitungwiza zvichitevera kupondwa kwenhengo yeCCC, Muzvare Moreblessing Ali, avo vakazowanikwa mutumbi wavo wakachekwachekwa. Nhengo dzakasungwa dzinosanganisira mutevedzeri wasachigaro vebato uye vari mumiriri weZengeza West muparamende, VaJob Sikhala, pamwe nemumiriri weChitungwiza North, VaGodfrey Sithole. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weCCC, VaGift Ostalos Siziba vanoti vari kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vabatane navo pakumira nenhengo dzavo gumi nenhatu idzi, idzo vanoti dziri kungoshungurudzwa sezvo dzakasungwa dzisina mhaka. VaSikhala naVaSithole vakanyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso nedare reHigh Court, mutongi wedare achiti anotyira kuti vakapiwa mukana, zvikuru VaSikhala, vanonopara dzimwe mhosva. VaSikhala ndivo gweta remhuri yaMuzvare Ali.

column2: Munhu Mumwe Chete Akafa neChirwere CheCovid-19 neSvondo kuMatabeleland South
column3: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti nemusi weSvondo munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kuMatabeleland South zvichireva kuti vanhu vafa vachiri chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe kana kuti 1,557. Vanhu makumi maviri nevaviri kana kuti 22 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatwa nacho vave zviuru makumi matatu nemasere ane makumi masere nevatanhatu kana kuti 38, 086. Vanhu makumi maviri nevaviri vakapora zvasiya vapora vave zviuru makumi matatu nemashanu zvine nezana nemakumi maviri nevatatu kana ktui 35, 123. Vanhu vachiri kurwara vave chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mana nevatanhatu kana kuti 1,406. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga vave zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi matatu nemazana matanhatu kana kuti 336, 600. Vabayiwa nhomba kaviri sezvinokurudzirwa vave zviuru makumi mashanu nematatu zvine mazana mana negumi nevasere kana kuti 53, 418.

column2: Vanopikisa Hurumende Voronga Kuratidzira muKupera kweMwedzi Uno.
column3: Mapato anopikisa, masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, masangano evashandi pamwe nevamwe vemakereke vanonzi vari kuronga kuratidzira kwevana veZimbabwe nyika yose musi wa 31 Chikunguru, unove mwedzi uno, vachinyunyutya nekwavanoti kutadza kutonga kwehurumende yeZanu PF. Mumwe wevari kutungamira hurongwa uhwu, uye vari mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume, vanoti hurumende yeZanu PF yakundikana kumisa huwori pamwe nekumutsiridza hupfumi hwenyika, izvo zvaisa vana veZimbabwe mukutambura kukuru. VaNgarivhume vanoti vari kushanda nemapato ose anopikisa nemamwe masangano anomirira vana veZimbabwe mumapoka akasiyanasiyana mukuronga kuratidzira uku, vachiti kunyange nhengo dzeZanu PF dziri kukokwawo kuti dzibatane nevamwe vanoda hutongo hwakanaka munyika. Asi mutauriri webato reMDC Alliance, Advocate Fadzai Mahere vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo harina kunge rakokwa zviri pamutemo, kunyange hazvo, sezvakataurwa nemutungamiri wavo VaNelson Chamisa neSvondo, vachabatana nevose vanoda kuti munyika muve neshanduko. Mutauriri weMDC-T, VaKhalipani Phugeni vatiwo bato ravo harisi muhurongwa hwekuratidzira uhwu. VaNgarivhume vanoti vane hurongwa hwekuzivisa mapurisa nezvekuratidzira kwavo neChipiri, uye vanotarisira kuti vacharatidzira murunyararo. No media source currently available Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko mubato riri kutonga reZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vanoti kunyange hazvo bumbiro remitemo richibvumidza vanhu kuratidzira, zviri kurongwa nevanopikisa izvi kutungana kwembudzi. VaMugwadi vanoti vari kurongwa kuratidzira vari kuziva kuti kune mutemo unorambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu nekuda kwechirwere che Covid-19 ndipo powoona vamwe vachida kupinda mumigwagwa kuti zvinhu zviparadzwe nekubiwa. Vanoti vanochengetedza mutemo havasi kuzorega zvakadaro zvichiitika. VaMugwadi vanoti kunyange hazvo nyika iine matambudziko ekushaikwa kwezvakawanda, hapana asingazive kuti izvi zviri kukonzerwa nezvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nenyika dzekumawirira. No media source currently available
